caption:
For healthy and shiny hair!

🎀Seoulista Glossy Locks Hair Mask

Helps to protect and soothe both your scalp and hair from root to tip. Designed for dry and damaged hair, a concentrated fusion of antioxidants, hydrating Hyaluronic Acid and strengthening hydrolysed keratin leaves your hair feeling and looking softer and silkier.  Generously infused with 35ml of intensive serum, the unique cap traps the natural heat from the head to aid absorption, and the drip-free formulation leaves your hair healthier, more manageable, and with a beautiful glossy shine.

Benefits:
Lipoplex™ - A unique complex that helps to protect and soothe both your scalp and hair from root to tip.

Hyaluronic Acid - Deeply hydrating, helps to lock in moisture and restore damaged hair back to its former glory.

Hydrolysed Keratin - Protein molecule that penetrates the hair cuticle to repair breakage, reduce frizz, and smooth damaged strands.

🎀Seoulista Silky Locks® Hair Wrap

Smoothing hair wrap offers a gentle, quick-drying solution to protect hair when it is at its most vulnerable, while protecting it from the damaging effects of friction - including breakage, thinning, frizz and split ends.

This lightweight hair wrap is kind to hair and, unlike traditional towelling, which can weigh heavy on your head, stops dragging at the roots to keep hair smooth and healthy from root to tip.

Gifted by @seoulista_beauty
